sections.title: Introduction

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The introduction section contains gene symbols.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Complete adherence as all gene symbols in the section are italicized.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: The introduction includes an infobox specific to gene/protein articles.
requirement_evaluations.evidence: The infobox template is present and structurally correct.
requirement_evaluations.reasoning: Complete adherence as the standard infobox template is applied.
requirement_evaluations.overlap_notes: No overlap with text data, as infobox serves a distinct purpose.

requirement_evaluations.applicability_reasoning: This requirement concerns the logical order of sections and is globally applicable rather than to individual sections.
There are no lists present in this section to apply bullet points.
There are no images in the introduction section, hence the placement of images is not applicable.

sections.meta_notes: The introduction section adheres fully to requirements for formatting gene symbols and including the standard infobox. No use of lists or images within this section makes some requirements non-applicable.
